SEARCH
Package scs1_group1.container.data

Class MedicineContainer

Object
RecordContainer
MedicineContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container
public class MedicineContainer extends RecordContainer
Container class for managing medicine records. Provides functionalities to load, retrieve, and export medicine data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MedicineContainer(String filePath)
    Constructs a MedicineContainer and loads medicines from the given CSV file.

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicineContainer

      public MedicineContainer(String filePath)
      Constructs a MedicineContainer and loads medicines from the given CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the CSV file containing medicine data.

  • Method Details

    • getAllMedicines

      public List<Medicine> getAllMedicines()
      Retrieves a list of all medicines in the container.
      Returns:
      A list of Medicine objects representing all medicines in the container.

    • getMedicineByName

      public Medicine getMedicineByName(String medicineName)
      Retrieves a medicine by its name.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Medicine object if found, otherwise null.

    • exportMedicineToCSV

      public void exportMedicineToCSV(String filePath)
      Exports all medicines in the container to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the CSV file to write to.
